Lightbox

Show your photos in lighbox

Posted by MADness on November 23, 2015   1 minute read ∼ Tagged with  :  tag-name-one • tag-name-two ∼ Filed in  : cat03

Have multiple photos side by side

Include your photo set in <div class="row"></div>

Image#01

Image#02

If the photos are not included in the div the text will float on the right.
